description: From 2012-2018, studied and graduated from the Physics department of Khachatur Abovian Armenian State Pedagogical University, receiving both bachelor's and master's degrees. Since 2018, she has been working as a physics teacher at Khachatur Abovian Secondary School No. 1 in Abovyan.
